title: Slayer of Those Whomst Reside In Afro-Eurasia (Or Australia (Or Antartica))

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Pit two people against each other in a ping test during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The two players will be privately notified they were pitted against. The first person to type any message in their private channel survives, while you immediately attack the player who fails to respond. They *will* perish in the middle of the day.
- In the case of a photo finish, both are slain.
- If you are left against one other person, you will immediately attack that other person. You may attack them again during each night while only 2 people are alive.
